Title: Suspends fees in connection with a REAL ID driver's license until 2026
Summary: Suspends fees in connection with a REAL ID driver's license or non-driver ID card until 2026; refunds fees paid since 2017.
LawCode: Amd ยง503, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to suspending fees for REAL ID cards; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon the expiration thereof
